content: At: Monash U Location: Clayton, Australia Web: monash.edu Position: Lecturer/Sr Lecturer (IT Data Science) _Contact_: Professor Geoff Webb, Faculty of Information Technology +61 3 9905 3296 /jobs/monash-university-job-openings Employment Type:  Full-time Duration: Continuing appointment Remuneration: $95,297 - $113,166 pa Level B / $116,737 - $134,606 pa Level C (plus 17% employer superannuation) Be inspired, every day Drive your own learning at one of the world’s top 80 universities Take your career in exciting, rewarding directions Everyone needs a platform to launch a satisfying career. At Monash, we give you the space and support to take your career in all kinds of exciting new directions. You’ll have access to quality research, infrastructure and learning facilities, opportunities to collaborate internationally, as well as the grants you’ll need to publish your work. We’re a university full of energetic and enthusiastic minds, driven to challenge what’s expected, expand what we know, and learn from other inspiring, empowering thinkers. The Opportunity Bring your passion and big ideas – join our world-class team shaping the future of Data Science! The Monash University Faculty of Information Technology has unsurpassed expertise across the broad range of areas of information technology that underpin the fast-developing field of data science. Harvard Business Review recently deemed  Data Scientist: The Sexiest Job of the 21st Century . Our degrees provide unparalleled pathways into careers in this exciting and lucrative profession. Our research is at the forefront of the field. We are investing strongly in further building our capacity and supporting our staff to realise their potential. As part of this commitment to excellence in data science, the Faculty of Information Technology is now seeking a Lecturer/Senior Lecturer to join our high achieving and highly motivated team of teaching and research staff. Applicants with a track record of high impact research and teaching in machine learning or advanced analytics are encouraged to apply. Our Faculty has a strong commitment to diversity, inclusion and flexibility in the workplace. At Monash, we are proud to have been awarded the prestigious citation for Employer of Choice for Gender Equality for our leading practice in advancing gender equity (monash.edu/gender-equity). If you are ready to take on this new challenge, we would love to hear from you! For further information on this role and details on how to apply, please click the following link: /jobs/monash-university-job-openings Enquiries Professor Geoff Webb, Faculty of Information Technology +61 3 9905 3296. Closing Date Sunday 8 July 2018, 11:55 pm AEST

Monash U: Lecturer/Sr Lecturer (IT Data Science)

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Australia, Clayton, Data Science, Lecturer, Monash University

Seeking a Lecturer/Senior Lecturer to join our high achieving and highly motivated team of teaching and research staff. Applicants with a track record of high impact research and teaching in machine learning or advanced analytics are encouraged to apply.


At: Monash U
Location: Clayton, Australia
Web: monash.edu
Position: Lecturer/Sr Lecturer (IT Data Science)


_Contact_:
Professor Geoff Webb, Faculty of Information Technology +61 3 9905 3296

https://www.monash.edu/jobs/monash-university-job-openings

Employment Type: Full-time
Duration: Continuing appointment
Remuneration: $95,297 - $113,166 pa Level B / $116,737 - $134,606 pa Level C (plus 17% employer superannuation)

  • Be inspired, every day
  • Drive your own learning at one of the world’s top 80 universities
  • Take your career in exciting, rewarding directions

Everyone needs a platform to launch a satisfying career. At Monash, we give you the space and support to take your career in all kinds of exciting new directions. You’ll have access to quality research, infrastructure and learning facilities, opportunities to collaborate internationally, as well as the grants you’ll need to publish your work. We’re a university full of energetic and enthusiastic minds, driven to challenge what’s expected, expand what we know, and learn from other inspiring, empowering thinkers.

The Opportunity

Bring your passion and big ideas – join our world-class team shaping the future of Data Science!

The Monash University Faculty of Information Technology has unsurpassed expertise across the broad range of areas of information technology that underpin the fast-developing field of data science. Harvard Business Review recently deemed Data Scientist: The Sexiest Job of the 21st Century. Our degrees provide unparalleled pathways into careers in this exciting and lucrative profession. Our research is at the forefront of the field. We are investing strongly in further building our capacity and supporting our staff to realise their potential.

As part of this commitment to excellence in data science, the Faculty of Information Technology is now seeking a Lecturer/Senior Lecturer to join our high achieving and highly motivated team of teaching and research staff. Applicants with a track record of high impact research and teaching in machine learning or advanced analytics are encouraged to apply.

Our Faculty has a strong commitment to diversity, inclusion and flexibility in the workplace. At Monash, we are proud to have been awarded the prestigious citation for Employer of Choice for Gender Equality for our leading practice in advancing gender equity (monash.edu/gender-equity).

If you are ready to take on this new challenge, we would love to hear from you!

For further information on this role and details on how to apply, please click the following link: https://www.monash.edu/jobs/monash-university-job-openings

Enquiries

Professor Geoff Webb, Faculty of Information Technology +61 3 9905 3296.

Closing Date

Sunday 8 July 2018, 11:55 pm AEST
